meanings.definition: Relating to the study of words and their origins.
meanings.sent1: The orismological research paper explored the origins of common words.
meanings.sent2: Her orismological knowledge helped her understand the history of language.
meanings.sent3: The orismological puzzle game challenged players to uncover word origins.
meanings.sent4: His orismological approach to language revealed hidden connections between words.
meanings.sent5: Studying orismological facts made the subject fascinating and enlightening.

meanings.definition: A branch of linguistics that focuses on the history and development of words.
meanings.sent1: The orismological class delved into the evolution of language.
meanings.sent2: She pursued a career in orismological research to explore word histories.
meanings.sent3: The orismological conference attracted experts from around the world.
meanings.sent4: In the library, shelves were filled with orismological books detailing word origins.
meanings.sent5: The professor's passion for orismological studies inspired his students.

meanings.definition: The study of the etymology of words.
meanings.sent1: Her interest in orismological studies led her to investigate word origins.
meanings.sent2: The orismological dictionary provided detailed explanations of word histories.
meanings.sent3: During the orismological lecture, students learned about word etymology.
meanings.sent4: The orismological research project aimed to uncover the roots of language.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the orismological aspects of language revealed fascinating connections.
